name: BIOE 117
title: Systematic Botany of Flowering Plants
description: An examination of the taxonomy and evolution of flowering plants. Special topics include phylogenetics and cladistics, plant species concepts, and modern methods of systematic research.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): BIOL 20A, BIOE 20B, and BIOE 20C, and satisfaction of the Entry Level Writing and Composition requirements. Must be taken concurrently with BIOE 117L.

class_notes: Concurrent enrollment in BIOE 117L is required.
